name: SE2-14 — MISÈRE LOOKOUT
description:
Chapter II — The Landing at Baie Lazare (Lazare Picault). La Misère Viewpoint, Mahé. From hardship's ridge, count two knots of wind.
The lights below betray the turn.

attributes.value: Chapter II — The Landing at Baie Lazare

properties.clue:
From hardship's ridge, count two knots of wind.
The lights below betray the turn.
properties.visual_description: Night panorama; ship lights at anchor; faint skull in sky; rope knotted twice.
